content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. I'm your AI assistant. May I start by getting your name, please?
Nice to meet you, Linda! Can I have your address to check if we're able to provide service to your location?
Sure, I live at 897 Pine Tree Lane, Springfield.
Thank you. One moment while I check if your address is within our service area.

I'm sorry, Linda, but it looks like your address is outside of our service area. We want to help, but unfortunately, we cannot provide service at your location. Could you please confirm if this is the correct address?
Yes, that's definitely the right address. I was hoping for an electrical check. Is there any way you can still assist?
I understand, Linda. Let me check if we have any exceptions or solutions for you. May I ask what time frame you are hoping to get the appointment?
I am flexible, but preferably within the coming week, any weekday afternoon.
Thank you for that info. I will now check our calendar for availability for an electrical job in the afternoons next week.

Unfortunately, it appears we don't have availability to book an appointment at your requested time, and as I mentioned earlier, your address is outside of our service area. I recommend seeking a local service provider. If you'd like, I can help connect you to someone else or escalate to a human operator for further assistance.
reason: Customer outside service area and no availability
